RESOURCE.NAME: Welsh Morphological Analyser
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Morphological Analyser for the Welsh Language.

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: File which defines rules for the morphological analysis

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation set used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: rootFeatureName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Name of the variable which shows the root word

PARAMETER.NAME: considerPOSTag
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If parser should consider POS Tag prior to running Morph

PARAMETER.NAME: caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If parser should be converted to lowercase first

PARAMETER.NAME: lexiconURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the lexicon file

PARAMETER.NAME: gazetteerListsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the gazetteer file

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions

PARAMETER.NAME: transducerURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the postprocess transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: validationTransducerURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the validation transducer
